trans-unit.source: This is a place holder for all the attributes related to the issued token
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor"></xref> class.
Adds a claim for the specified authentication method to the subject of the current instance.
The authentication instant is set to the current time.

A <xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim> with a claim type of <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.AuthenticationMethod> and a value of `authType` and a <xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim> with a claim type of <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.AuthenticationInstant> and a value of <xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A> are added to the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity> specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Subject%2A> property..
A URI that specifies the authentication method.
Adds claims for the specified authentication type and authentication instant to the subject of the current instance.

A <xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim> with a claim type of <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.AuthenticationMethod> and a value of `authType` and a <xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim> with a claim type of <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.AuthenticationInstant> and a value of `time` are added to the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity> specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Subject%2A> property.
A URI that specifies the authentication method.
The authentication instant in UTC.
If the time is not in UTC, it is converted to UTC.
Gets or sets the address for the AppliesTo property in the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref>.
An absolute URI that represents the address.
An attempt to set the property to a value that is not an absolute URI occurs.
Sets the appropriate properties of the specified RSTR based on the properties of the current instance.
The RSTR to which to apply the settings of the current instance.
response is `null`.
Gets or sets the key identifier clause when the token is attached to the message
The key identifier clause.
Gets or sets the authentication information for the token.
The authentication information for the token.
Gets or sets the credentials that are used to encrypt the token.
The credentials that are used to encrypt the token.
Gets or sets the lifetime information for the issued token.
The lifetime information for the issued token.
Gets or sets the proof descriptor for the issued token, which can be used to modify some fields inside the RSTR, such as requested proof token.
The proof descriptor.
Gets the properties bag for the issued token.
The dictionary that represents the properties bag.
Gets or sets the address for the ReplyToAddress property in the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref>.
A URI that represents the address.
Gets or sets the credentials that are used to sign the token.
The credentials that are used to sign the token.
Gets or sets the output claims to be included in the issued token.
The claims identity that contains the output claims.
Gets or sets the issued security token.
The issued security token.
Gets or sets the issuer name, which may be used inside the issued token also.
The issuer name.
Gets or sets the token type of the issued token
The token type.
The key identifier clause when the issued token is not attached to the message.
The key identifier clause.
